title: Ticket #912: Static buffer in cream_gahp command processing
description:
When the cream_gahp processes a command, it allocates a static buffer of 500 entries to hold the arguments to that command. If the command has more than 500 arguments, the gahp will blithely run past the end of the array. Currently, this only affects the CREAM_PROXY_RENEW command when there are 500 or more jobs associated with the renewed proxy. Other commands can have more than 500 arguments, but the gridmanager doesn't use them in that way currently.

The static buffer needs to be resized when the available data will overflow it.
